properties.entry: SELECT s.Registration_No, s.File_No, s.Enroll_No, s.Uni_Enroll_No, s.First_Name, s.Last_Name, s.Father_Name, s.Gender, s.DOB, s.Email_Id, s.Category_Id, s.Course_Id, s.Branch_Id, s.Created_On, s.Updated_On, s.Quota_Code, s.Academic_Year, s.Semester, s.Lateral, s.Batch_Id, s.Session_Id, s.Shift_Id, s.Centre_Id, s.Section_Id, s.Lateral from student_detail s WHERE s.Registration_No=IFNULL(:Registration_No,s.Registration_No) and Course_Id = IFNULL(:Course_Id,Course_Id) and Branch_Id = IFNULL(:Branch_Id,Branch_Id) and ifnull(Email_Id,'-1')=ifnull(:Email_Id,ifnull(Email_Id,'-1')) and ifnull(Enroll_No,'-1')=ifnull(:Enroll_No,ifnull(Enroll_No,'-1')) and ifnull(Uni_Enroll_No,'-1')=ifnull(:Uni_Enroll_No,ifnull(Uni_Enroll_No,'-1')) and ifnull(Self_Mobile_No,'-1') = ifnull(:Self_Mobile_No,ifnull(Self_Mobile_No,'-1')) and First_Name like :First_Name;

select * from (select registration_No, File_No, First_Name, Last_Name, Enroll_No, Father_Name, Gender, DOB, Course_Id, Branch_Id, Semester, Academic_Year, Updated_On, Category_Id from StudentDetail where Management_Approval != 1 order by Updated_On desc) as Admissionbasicinfo limit :limit;
Delete from Academic_Detail where File_No =:File_No and Student_Qualification_Id not in (:Student_Qualification_Id)
Delete from Admission_Discount_Dtl where File_No=:File_No and Discount_Dtl_Id not in (:Discount_Dtl_Id)
Delete from Qualification_Subject_Dtl where File_No =:File_No and Student_Qualification_Id=:Student_Qualification_Id and Student_Qualification_Id not in (:Student_Qualification_Id)
Delete from Branch_Preference where File_No =:File_No and Branch_Preference_Id not in (:Branch_Preference_Id)
delete from counselling_Detail where File_No=:File_No and Stdnt_Counslling_Id not in (:Stdnt_Counslling_Id)
delete from STUDENT_DOCUMENTS where File_No not in (:File_No) and Student_Doc_Id not in (:Student_Doc_Id)
